name: dog-eat-food-world
description:
Escape this dog-eat-dog world. Come to dog-eat-food world. You are a dog and you want to eat food. Catch the food as it flies by.

installation

OSX: Download the OSX zip and run the app inside. it just works TM

WIN: There's been a report that this build isn't working, so try the Linux / Everything Else instructions if this isn't working. Download the win32 zip and run dog-eat-food-world.exe. Keep the exe in the folder it's extracted to, otherwise Love won't have its dependencies met.

LINUX / EVERYTHING ELSE: Install the latest version of Love for your system (https://love2d.org/) and download/run dog-eat-food-world.love with Love. <3.

inspiration
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dD9NgzLhbBM
